vc.prottype: FWLIBAPI short WINAPI cnc_rdtlgrp(unsigned short FlibHndl, long grp_no, short* num, IODBTLGRP *tlgrp);

cmn.p: Reads the tool group information. The following information can be acquired.

ul.li: Type of tool life counter (0 : count, 1 : minute)

cmn.p: The unit of the tool life value is either [minute] or [count]. The parameter LTM (Series 15i:7400#3, Series16i/18i/21i, 0i, 30i:6800#2) determines which unit is used. The parameter LTM (30i:6800#2) determines which unit is used.
For M Series, it is possible to specify the tool life counter type (time or count) by G10 command to every tool group.

content.p: Specify the library handle. See "Library handle" for details.
Pointer to the number of groups to be read. Actual number of groups being read is stored after this function call.

Pointer to the array of the ODBTLGRP structure including the tool group information. The ODBTLGRP structure is as follows.
typedef struct iodbtlgrp { long ntool; /* number of tool */ long nfree; /* number of free tool */ long life; /* tool life */ long count; /* tool life counter */ long use_tool; /* selected tool use-order number */ long opt_grpno; /* optional tool group number */ long life_rest; /* rest counter */ short rest_sig; /* status of rest signal */ short count_type; /* type of tool life counter */ } ODBTLGRP ;
The following information are stored in "tlgrp" with binary format.
ntool Number of tool nfree Number of free tool life Tool life value count Tool life counter use_tool Selected tool use-order number opt_grpno Optional tool group number *Note1) life_rest Rest counter *Note1) rest_sig Status of rest signal *Note2)
0:rest signal OFF
1:rest signal ON
count_type Tool life counter type
0:count
1:minute
Note1) It is -1 when Series 15i and without the tool life management B function in Series 16i/18i and 30i.
Note2) It is 0 when Series 15i and without the tool life management B function in Series 16i/18i and 30i.
Note1) It is -1 when without the tool life management B function.
Note2) It is 0 when without the tool life management B function.

item.name: EW_LENGTH
item.content:
Data block length error
The number of tool groups (*num) is 0 or less.

item.name: EW_NUMBER
item.content:
Data number error
The specification of tool group number (grp_no) is wrong.

item.name: EW_NOOPT
item.content:
No option
The tool life management function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.

hssb.p: The extended driver/library function are necessary.

ethr.p: The Ethernet function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.
However, in case of Series 16i/18i/21i-B, 0i-B/C/D and 30i the required CNC option is as follows.

p.ul: above two optional functions are not required.

option.need:
Series 15i, 16/18/21/21i, 0i, 30i The tool life management function.
Series 16i/18i The tool life management function or the tool life management B function.

type.li:
Series 15i
This function is influenced by 1024/512 pairs of the tool life management.

Series 16i/18i/21i
This function is influenced by 512(M Series)/128(T Series) pairs of the tool life management.

Series 30i
This function is influenced by additional pairs number of the tool life management.
the tool life management :256 pairs of the tool life management on whole system, both of M and T Series
additional pairs number of the tool life management:1024 pairs of the tool life management on whole system, both of M and T Series

hssb.p: The tool life management function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.
And this function is influenced by additional pairs number of the tool life management.

tr.td: 256 pairs of the tool life management on whole system, both of M and T Series
additional pairs number of the tool life management
1024 pairs of the tool life management on whole system, both of M and T Series

type.ul:
Series 15i 7400#0,#1,#3
Series 16i/18i/21i 6800#0,#1,#2
6802#5 (Optional group number)
Series 30i 6800#0,#1,#2
6802#5 (Optional group number)
6805#4 (Tool life management B)
6813
Series 0i-A/B/C 6800#0,#1,#2
8132#0=1 (must be set)
Series 0i-D 6800#0,#1,#2
6813
8132#0=1 (must be set)
